response.overview: Bob May entered the entertainment business at an early age working with his grandfather Chic Johnson on the American classic Hellzapoppin’ comedy show.  Since then he hasn’t looked back, his CV is endless… including roles in nine Jerry Lewis films, plus Jailhouse Rock, 77 Sunset Strip, Time Tunnell… the list goes on and on!  But it’s his role as the Robot in Lost in Space that Myth Makers are focusing on, and in this engrossing interview by Nicholas Briggs, Bob regales us with an hour of fascinating stories behind one of the most loved and successful science fiction TV series ever made – it even knocked Star Trek off the ratings when it first aired!
response.title: Myth Makers 65: Bob May
